thread.title: Saturday Night Takeaway viewers stunned by Steps singer Claire Richards' weight loss
thread.title_full: Saturday Night Takeaway viewers stunned by Steps singer Claire Richards' weight loss

title: Saturday Night Takeaway viewers stunned by Steps singer Claire Richards' weight loss
text:
Twitter NO TRAGEDY HERE: TV viewers were stunned by Claire's appearance at the Steps reunion 
The hit 90s band continued their 20th Anniversary celebrations with a reunion on Ant and Dec's Saturday Night Takeaway. 
Performing their hit single Tragedy — originally sung by the Bee Gees — Steps raised the roof. 
But their highly-anticipated reunion was somewhat overshadowed by bandmate Claire Richards' impressive weight loss. 
The 36-year-old stunned viewers by flaunting her svelte new figure in a sheer-panelled black top and trousers. 
Instagram NEW LOOK: Claire has never looked better Reality TV stars weight loss transformations Thursday, 5th January 2017 Amazingly, these reality TV stars have lost more than 40st between them... all thanks to healthy eating and exercise 1 / 13 Scarlett Moffatt shows off her weight loss 
Wenn TRANSFORMATION: Claire has lost six stone in two years 
Claire is a well-documented yo-yo dieter, who has been open about her weight struggles. 
However, the singer has never looked better, having lost six stone in the past two years — and fans were quick to show their approval. 
Taking to Twitter, one admirer said: "When you realise that you always have and always will fancy Claire from Steps," followed by a heart-eyed emoji. 
Another viewer said: "How much weight has Claire from Steps lost?" followed by a shocked-face emoji. 
Twitter
